summary: Tracing tags are inconsistent across different Temporal SDKs. This feature request asks for standardization of tracing tags across all SDKs (Go, Java, TypeScript, etc.) to ensure consistent observability across different language implementations.
userImpact: Developers using multiple Temporal SDKs experience inconsistent tracing tag formats, making it difficult to correlate traces and build unified observability solutions.
proposedFix: Standardize tracing tag naming and format across all SDK implementations (Go, Java, TypeScript, Python, etc.)
keyQuote: Tracing tags are not consistent across SDKs.
